Description: Gibson 50th Anniversary Flying V Brimstone Burst 2008 This guitar is in excellent condition. This guitar is all original, no modifications. There are a few light scratches and one no ding on the back near the control cover (pictured). There have been no repairs of any kind. I am the 2nd owner. See detailed pictures of the actual guitar. I keep all of my guitars well maintained, waxed, wiped down, stored in their cases and boxed in a climate controlled room. Comes with the vacuumed Gibson OHS case. The Gibson 50th Anniversary shroud is included. It does have two yellow stains (looks like glue stains?). Gibson Commemorative 50th Anniversary Flying V features: AA Maple top, beveled body Brimstone finish ’57 Classic and ’57 Classic Plus PickupsGold hardware Ebony fingerboard Split block inlay w/gold frets One volume, one tone control 3-way pickup selector switch McCarty designed headstock logo Steinberger gearless tuners Special GOTM case Extra 50th Anniversary truss rod coverI ship every guitar fast and pack safely. Signature is required upon delivery.
